title: Part 1722 - Committees Of Estates Of Incompetent Persons
content:
Part 1722 - Committees Of Estates Of Incompetent Persons

State Regulations
§ 1722.1 - Commissions
§ 1722.2 - Attorney's fees on annual account
§ 1722.3 - Fees paid to personal sureties
§ 1722.4 - Traveling expenses
§ 1722.5 - Charges for legal services rendered to committee
§ 1722.6 - Name of depository to be given
§ 1722.7 - Original vouchers to be submitted with annual account

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
